doc:
Nicholas Smith (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicholas_Smith_(actor) 0 Nicholas John Smith (5 March 1934 – 6 December 2015) was an English actor. He was known for his role in the BBC sitcom Are You Being Served?, in which he played Mr Rumbold, a manager at the fictional Grace Brothers department store. Nicholas_John_Smith ( 5_March_1934 – 6_December_2015 ) was an_English_actor . He was_known for his_role in the_BBC_sitcom Are You Being_Served ? , in which he played Mr_Rumbold , a_manager at the_fictional_Grace_Brothers_department_store .
